text: The 20/20 Experience (also known as The 20/20 Experience â€“ 1 of 2) is the third studio album by Justin Timberlake. It was released on March 15, 2013, by RCA Records Three singles were released from the album. It was the best selling album of 2013 in the US. ==References== Category:2013 albums Category:Justin Timberlake albums Category:Soul albums
title: The 20/20 Experience
